articles.author: Jeran Wittenstein, Ryan Vlastelica
articles.title: Big Tech Is Back in S&P 500 Driver’s Seat as Profit Engines Hum - Bloomberg
articles.description: The same technology giants that helped drag the S&P 500 to the brink of a bear market in April are giving the recovery in US equities some legs.
articles.content:
The same technology giants that helped drag the S&P 500 to the brink of a bear market in April are giving the recovery in US equities some legs.
Nvidia Corp. put a bow on a better-than-expected … [+280 chars]
